DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate 5 μg/kg Tbo-filgrastim Infants , Children Adolescents With Solid Tumors Without Bone Marrow Involvement
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Male female infant , child adolescent age 1 month < 16 year . 2 . Patients solid tumor without bone marrow involvement , schedule receive myelosuppressive CTX . 3 . Body weight ≥5 kg . 4 . Patients must initial diagnosis histologic proof malignancy . All enrolled subject sign consent CTX regimen know myelotoxic , count expect drop absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) 0.5 × 109/L least 3 day . These regimen would include least one following : Etoposide doxorubicin ifosfamide cyclophosphamide 5 . ANC platelet count : Patients must ANC > 1 × 109/L platelet count > 100 × 109/L eligible therapy start CTX . 6 . Normal cardiac , renal , hepatic function . 7 . All subject must life expectancy 12 week . 8 . Performance Status : Lansky performance score > 60 ( age 1 < 16 year ) . More criterion may apply , please contact investigator information . Exclusion : 1 . Bone marrow involvement . 2 . Active myelogenous leukemia history myelogenous leukemia . 3 . Previous treatment colonystimulating factor ( granulocyte colonystimulating factor [ GCSF ] , granulocytemacrophage colonystimulating factor , interleukin 11 [ IL11 ] ) less 6 week prior study entry . 4 . History congenital neutropenia cyclic neutropenia . 5 . Pregnant nursing female patient . 6 . Fertile patient agree use highly reliable contraceptive measure Prior bone marrow stem cell transplant , prior radiation ≥25 % bone marrow within 4 week prior first tbofilgrastim dose . 7 . Ongoing active infection history infectious disease within 2 week prior screen visit . 8 . Treatment lithium screening plan study More criterion may apply , please contact investigator information .
